caption.center: RICKY FUQUA, APPELLANT, v. STATE OF MISSOURI, RESPONDENT.

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District.

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM DIVISION 4 CIRCUIT COURT, JACKSON COUNTY; ALVIN C. RANDALL, JUDGE.
opinion.attorneys:
Charles W. Gardner, Lee's Summit, for appellant.
John Ashcroft, Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, Philip M. Koppe, Asst. Atty. Gen., Kansas City, for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before SOMERVILLE, P.J., and MANFORD and LOWENSTEIN, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER
[1] This is a direct appeal from denial of post-conviction relief pursuant to Rule 27.26.
[2] Judgment affirmed. Rule 84.16(b).
